item.description: The paper that changed everything: “Attention Is All You Need” (2017).

item.title: How Transformers Know Position: Positional Encoding
item.description: Self-attention is permutation equivariant. Shuffle the input tokens, output shuffles the same way.

item.title: Self-Attention: The Key to Transformers
item.description: Regular attention: query from one sequence, attend to another. Self-attention: query, key, value all come from same sequence.

item.title: Attention Mechanisms (Part 1): The Core Idea
item.description: LSTMs helped with long-range dependencies. Attention does something more powerful - direct connections from anywhere to anywhere.

item.title: Layer Normalization for Stable Training
item.description: Deep networks have unstable activations. Values explode or vanish as they pass through layers.
